thread.title: F&O total turnover stood at Rs 4,83,513.30 crore on September 23
thread.title_full: F&O total turnover stood at Rs 4,83,513.30 crore on September 23 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: F&O total turnover stood at Rs 4,83,513.30 crore on September 23
text:
Other Articles Strides Arcolab shares jump over 3% after Jefferies initiates coverage with 'buy' NIIT shares gain over 4% on European Delivery Centre in Dublin plans Elder Pharmaceuticals shares surge on eyeing to sell overseas business Future & Option (F&O) total turnover stood at 4,83,513.30 crore on September 23 and the total number of contracts traded on the day were 2,16,21,352.
Of the total turnover, Index Futures contributed Rs 33,520.88 crore, Stock Futures Rs 60,763.55 crore and Index Options Rs 3,77,445.61 crore, while the contribution of the Stock Options was of Rs 11,783.26 crore.
For the day, the total F&O PutCall ratio stood 1.01 while Index Options PutCall ratio was 1.03 and that of Stock Options was 0.59.
The top five scrips with highest PCR on OI were Indraprastha Gas (1.61), Maruti Suzuki India (1.48), IndusInd Bank (1.38), Ultratech Cement (1.23) and CEAT (1.17).
Among most active underlying, State Bank of India witnessed a contraction of 4.28 million of Open Interest in the September month futures contract, followed by Axis Bank witnessing a contraction of 0.65 million of Open Interest in the September month contract; Maruti Suzuki India witnessed a contraction of 0.05 million of Open Interest in the September month contract, Reliance Industries witnessed a contraction of 1.38 million of Open Interest in the September month contract and ICICI Bank witnessed a contraction of 5.08 million units of Open Interest in the September month’s future contract.
 24, 2015 9:52 am © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
